channel.title: Dropout?
channel.description:
I've recently been thinking about dropping out of school. No matter how much I study and shit I still get like fucking 10s on shit I work my ass off for. I used to be a junky, I did acid, codones, shrooms, 2cp, speed, nitro, weed, n' coke, I took one or the other of that shit in my system everyday, that probably plays a good role in why I just can't pass.
What do you think I should do? Cheat my way through so life can fucking deal with me brutally when I get a job of too high standards for me? I think I should drop out.

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @Zezimaam Zezimaam
item.description:
@Zezimaam wrote:

You’re gonna be in a FUCK THE WORLD attitude and end up sleeping in the streets and doing anything for drugs. It happened to my sister, and now she’s going back to college barely passing.

All that’s going to happen is you’re gonna go back and waste a lot of years…

My bro dropped out and he regrets it immensely. He lives with my mom he’s 29 and smokes weed everyday.

Read full topic

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:1, topic:418141”]I’ve recently been thinking about dropping out of school. No matter how much I study and shit I still get like fucking 10s on shit I work my ass off for. I used to be a junky, I did acid, codones, shrooms, 2cp, speed, nitro, weed, n’ coke, I took one or the other of that shit in my system everyday, that probably plays a good role in why I just can’t pass.

What do you think I should do? Cheat my way through so life can fucking deal with me brutally when I get a job of too high standards for me? I think I should drop out.[/quote]

Stay in school. I dropped out at 16 and it took me 3 years to find a job. I finally got a job in August and tbh it’s the best I could get. I bust my ass moving furniture, loading semi trucks, and driving a forklift.

Whats the best outlook for my future? Spending $600+ on getting A CDL (Truck driving license) and driving a truck for the rest of my life. Did I want it? No. Did I want it at the time? Yes. Kicking myself in the ass now.

Bright side? Lots of hookers in my future. (jks)

Read full topic

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I dropped out and i’m now on more money than most.
Each to their own i guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:100, topic:418141”]I did enough drugs for the both of us, and I still graduated.

Your teachers will give u a passing final mark if you pull up your socks. Do well on final exams etc… Talk to them and see how you can bring up mark and you will be in their goodbooks.

Time flies. I graduated 5 years ago and I’m so glad I didn’t drop out like I had planned to.[/quote]Well I guess I’m just stupid then, I make A’s in my English classes, I’ll try to be staying in school.

@m1lk, how is that good for me? In the song, he ends up murdering the girl.

Read full topic

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I did enough drugs for the both of us, and I still graduated.

Your teachers will give u a passing final mark if you pull up your socks. Do well on final exams etc… Talk to them and see how you can bring up mark and you will be in their goodbooks.

Time flies. I graduated 5 years ago and I’m so glad I didn’t drop out like I had planned to.

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Do what you want, mate. Just remember education is a form of teaching. You can learn from other methods the only thing the other methods doesn’t provide is a method of proving you have this knowledge.
Do what you want to do but aim for something, always aim for something. I do drugs, yeah not almost everyday now only the odd occasion but doing drugs never made me a bad person? I’m more likely to start a fight with someone now that I am more intelegent if you understand what I mean?
Cheer up bigman, you seemed frustrated when you made this post.

Read full topic

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Drop out then, get a partner. Get a cheap apartment in a bad neighborhood, do some petty theft to buy a weed lamp and grow. Grow upstairs and party downstairs. Get a good customer base and expand. There is money in weed and it will probably be legal within the next 10-15 years if we get a Libertarian president.

Read full topic

item.title: Dropout?
item.dc:creator: @mona_lisa mona lisa
item.description:
@mona_lisa wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:82, topic:418141”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=520689.msg3788218#msg3788218 date=1319067808]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=520689.msg3788213#msg3788213 date=1319067612]

[quote author=m1lkman link=topic=520689.msg3788211#msg3788211 date=1319067510]

Trust me. This drug addict talked to me and my friend when we were chilling at a park, and he said don’t drop out cus you gotta work your ass off when your parents kick your ass out. And since your friends are still going to school, you gotta wait around for them to get out of school. Graduate with shitty grades but no that if you drop out, your life will be twice as hard as it was studying for school.

[/quote]i dont live with my parents

Okay, how do you support yourself then?
[/quote]I don’t

HOW THE HELL DO YOU HAVE INTERNET AND GET FOOD TO EAT AND MONEY TO BUY UR DRUGS?!?
[/quote]Last time I saw my real parents was when I was two, I’ve been house-hopping for a while but I’ve been in the current house that I’m in now for about three years, so I guess you could say I’m adopted. How do I get my drug money? It’s a never ending cycle of buying and selling weed [I sell weed a ton].[/quote]

do you do bizz with a guy named charlie?

Read full topic
